'''"Beast Lord of Fuyu"''' is a quest-exclusive enemy encountered in {{Quest|Floating Jade, Treasure of Chenyu}}.

{{Enemy Stats
|resglobal    = 15%

==Abilities==
''Most attack names are unofficial.''
{{Enemy Attacks
|enemy = Beast Lord of Fuyu

|name_1      = Splash
|desc_1      = Launches a ball of water at the player, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Hydro DMG}}.

|name_2      = Rage
|desc_2      = This attack is only used after its HP has fallen below '''50%'''. Jumps up and down repeatedly, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}} when slamming down, and marking areas on the ground where water splashes will occur, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Hydro DMG}}.

|name_3      = Healing Over Time
|desc_3      = Recovers '''1%''' of its Max [[HP]] every 5 seconds.
}}
